participant_1.name: Greg
participant_1.personality: Greg is friendly and enjoys sharing his experiences. He has a curious mind and appreciates technology.
participant_1.background: i'm a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

participant_2.name: Abigail
participant_2.personality: Abigail is outgoing and loves social gatherings. She has a passion for music and enjoys spending time with her pets.
participant_2.background: i like to go to country concerts on weekends. i like to work on vintage cars. i have two dogs. my favorite music is country.
